# maximumChannelCount

**Instance Property**

The maximum number of channels supported for this bus.

## Declaration

```swift
var maximumChannelCount: AUAudioChannelCount { get set }
```

## Discussion

If the value of [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AUAudioUnitBus/supportedChannelCounts] is set, then this value is derived from it. If setting a new value on this property makes the current bus format unsupported, then the value of [doc://com.apple.audiotoolbox/documentation/AudioToolbox/AUAudioUnitBus/format] is set to `nil`.

The default value is `UINT_MAX`.

## Audio Unit Implementations

- **init(format:)**: Initializes a bus object with a specific format.
- **supportedChannelCounts**: An array of numbers indicating the supported number of channels for this bus.
